statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_positions;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_positions;
SELECT altitude, longitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM satellite_positions WHERE altitude < 500;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM satellite_positions WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE altitude > 1000 ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, longitude, latitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0 ORDER BY altitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_positions WHERE altitude BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC;
SELECT satellite_id AS id, altitude AS alt FROM satellite_positions WHERE altitude < 5000 AND (latitude > 0 OR longitude < 0) ORDER BY altitude DESC, satellite_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_name ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, position_point FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT MAX(altitude) AS max_altitude FROM positions;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM positions WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -90 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, position_point::geography FROM satellites WHERE ST_DWithin(position_point, ST_GeogFromText('POINT(-74.0060 40.7128)'), 100000) ORDER BY satellite_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellites
SELECT satellite_name, position_point FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_name DESC
SELECT satellite_name, position_point FROM satellites WHERE satellite_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT satellite_name, position_point FROM satellites WHERE position_point IS NOT NULL
SELECT satellite_id, COUNT(*) FROM positions GROUP BY satellite_id
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT id, name FROM satellites;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM satellites;
SELECT * FROM positions WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM satellites ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM satellites WHERE latitude > 10 AND longitude < 20;
SELECT s.name, p.latitude, p.longitude FROM satellites s INNER JOIN positions p ON s.id = p.satellite_id;
SELECT u.username, p.latitude, p.longitude FROM users u, positions p WHERE u.user_id = p.position_id ORDER BY u.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, latitude, longitude FROM satellites WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM positions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude FROM user_positions JOIN positions ON user_positions.position_id = positions.position_id;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT u.username, p.latitude, p.longitude FROM users u JOIN user_positions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN positions p ON up.position_id = p.position_id
SELECT u.username, p.latitude, p.longitude FROM users u JOIN user_positions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN positions p ON up.position_id = p.position_id WHERE p.timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, latitude FROM satellites;
SELECT * FROM positions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude FROM positions WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT history_id, login_timestamp FROM user_history WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE latitude > 0 ORDER BY satellite_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT satellite_name, longitude FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT satellite_id, MAX(latitude) AS max_latitude FROM satellites GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING MAX(latitude) > 10;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellites INNER JOIN positions ON satellites.satellite_id = positions.satellite_id WHERE positions.latitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'user%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
